title: Research-Based Learning Design for Integrating Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of sustainable development and policy comprehension, basic competencies in engineering/social sciences
context.additional_context: An educational environment emphasizing interdisciplinary collaboration and community problem-solving based on practical work experience as professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the social and environmental contexts of the SDGs and propose three or more strategies applicable to practical settings.
Learners can diagnose sustainability issues in local communities and design solution models using research-based methodologies.
Learners can integrate academic and practical outcomes into a portfolio format through self-directed learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
